install.author: Todor Iliev
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Todor Iliev ( ITPrism.com ). All rights reserved.
install.description:
ITPSocialButtons is a plugin that adds social network buttons on your page.

Invest in the extension improvement and sponsor it via SMS or PayPal.

Please, vote for the plugin on Joomla! Extensions Directory

param.name: style
param.label: Style
param.description: These are icons packages. Choose a kind of icons.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Choose a position of the icons in your article.

param.name: showInArticles
param.label: Show In Articles
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'article'.

param.name: showInCategories
param.label: Show In Categories
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'category'.

param.name: showInSections
param.label: Show In Sections
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'section'.

param.name: showInFrontPage
param.label: Show In FrontPage
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'frontpage'.

param.name: excludeSections
param.label: Exclude sections
param.description: List with excluded sections divided by comma. Enter sections IDs.

param.name: excludeCats
param.label: Exclude categories
param.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. Enter categories IDs.

param.name: excludeArticles
param.label: Exclude articles
param.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. Enter articles IDs.

param.name: includeArticles
param.label: Display in that articles
param.description: Displays the buttons in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. You must enter the IDs of articles, didived by comma.

param.name: showTitle
param.label: Show title
param.description: Display the title which is located on the top of the icons.

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: The title which is located on the top of the icons.

param.name: displayLines
param.label: Display lines
param.description: Shows or hide dividing lines which will be appear in above or below the icons.

param.name: displayIcons
param.label: Icons position
param.description: This is a position of the icons.
